title: Global Battle on Coronavirus, Electric Cars at the Big Game, Devon Kennard
itunes:title: Global Battle on Coronavirus, Electric Cars at the Big Game, Devon Kennard
description:
Bloomberg News Health Reporter Michelle Cortez and Bloomberg News White House Reporter Jordan Fabian break down the political and economic impact of the coronavirus. David Welch, Bloomberg News Detroit Bureau Chief, discusses GM, Audi and Porsche showing off battery-powered models at the Super Bowl. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy share their insight on the global battle to get the coronavirus below its tipping point. Devon Kennard, linebacker for the Detroit Lions, talks about being nominated for the Walter Payton Man of the Year Award. And we Drive to the Close with Ross Gerber, CEO at Gerber Kawasaki Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
